sentences.sentence: Rifle-thieves scoured all India to reinforce the efforts of the honest smuggler.
sentences.translation: 窃枪贼搜遍了整个印度，以增援纯走私者的行动。

sentences.sentence: One international currency smuggler who was having trouble getting money out of Britain was offered help by a group of men who said they were in a position to "fix thing"— for a fee of course.
sentences.translation: 一个国际货币走私犯把钱转移出英国时遇到困难，但他得到了一群人的帮助，生称他们可以“解决问题”——当然是在有偿的前提下。

sentences.sentence: The smuggler shrugged to the bugler hugging the bug in the tugboat.
sentences.translation: 私运者对在拖船中拥抱臭虫的号手耸耸肩。
